class.name: CATAfrCheckHeaderAccessor
class.abstract: Class to handle a check header.

method.name: GetCheckCommand
method.abstract: Returns the command header identifier associated to the "check" state.

method.name: GetResourceFile
method.abstract: Returns the resource file name associated to the check header.

method.name: GetUncheckCommand
method.abstract: Returns the command header identifier associated to the "uncheck" state.

method.name: IsChecked
method.abstract: Returns the check button state.

method.name: SetCheck
method.abstract: Sets the state of the check button.

method.name: SetCheckCommand
method.abstract: Associates a command header to the "check" state.

method.name: SetResourceFile
method.abstract: Associates a resource file name to the check header.

method.name: SetUncheckCommand
method.abstract: Associates a command header to the "uncheck" state.

class.name: CATAfrCommandHeaderRep
class.abstract: Base class to create a customized representation for a command header.

constructor.name: CATAfrCommandHeaderRep
constructor.abstract: Constructs a customized representation for a command header.

method.name: Build
method.abstract: Creates the customized representation.

method.name: GetDialogParent
method.abstract: Retrieves the dialog parent.

class.name: CATAfrDialogCommandHeader
class.abstract: Base class to create a command header with a customized representation.

method.name: Clone
method.abstract: Clones the command header.

class.name: CATApplicationFrame
class.abstract: Class representing the application main window model.

method.name: GetApplicationDocument
method.abstract: Returns the application document.

method.name: GetCurrentWorkbench
method.abstract: Returns the internal name of the current workbench.

method.name: GetCurrentWorkshop
method.abstract: Returns the internal name of the current workshop.

method.name: GetFrame
method.abstract: Retrieves a pointer to the application frame.

method.name: GetMainWindow
method.abstract: Returns the main window.

method.name: HidePalette
method.abstract: Hides a toolbar.

method.name: SetBusyCursor
method.abstract: Changes the cursor mouse into a busy cursor.

method.name: SetMessage
method.abstract: Displays a message in the status bar.

method.name: ShowPalette
method.abstract: Displays a toolbar.

enum.name: MessageType
enum.abstract: Type of message to displays in the status bar.

class.name: CATBatchFrame
class.abstract: Base class to define the user interface of a specific batch.

method.name: FillParametersFile
method.abstract: Fills the parameters file through batch user interface.

class.name: CATCSO
class.abstract: Class containing the selection.

method.name: AddElement
method.abstract: Adds an element to the selection.

method.name: AddSO
method.abstract: Adds a set of elements to the selection.

method.name: Contains
method.abstract: Tells whether an element is contained in the list.

method.name: Empty
method.abstract: Empties the selection.

method.name: GetSize
method.abstract: Returns the number of selected elements.

method.name: InitElementList
method.abstract: Initializes the cursor to the begining of the element list.

method.name: Locate
method.abstract: Returns the position of an element in the selection.

method.name: NextElement
method.abstract: Returns the element at cursor position.

method.name: RemoveElement
method.abstract: Removes an element from the selection.

enum.name: AddSOType
enum.abstract: Indicates how to add a set of elements to the selection.

class.name: CATCSOChangeNotification
class.abstract: Class representing a notification whose instance is sent when the selection is changed.

data.name: Add
data.abstract: List of elements added to the selection.

data.name: Remove
data.abstract: List of elements removed from the selection.

class.name: CATCmdAccess
class.abstract: Base class to create an access.

method.name: SetName
method.abstract: Sets the access name.

class.name: CATCmdContainer
class.abstract: Class to create the container's access.

method.name: AddChild
method.abstract: Declares an access to add in a container.

enum.name: ComponentPosition
enum.abstract: Position of the toolbar in the application window.

class.name: CATCmdSeparator
class.abstract: Class to create a separator's access .

class.name: CATCmdStarter
class.abstract: Class to create a starter's access.

class.name: CATCmdWorkbench
class.abstract: Class to create the workbench's access .

enum.name: CATAfrToolbarStyle
enum.abstract: Defines the button representation in the toolbars.

class.name: CATCmdWorkshop
class.abstract: Class to create the workshop's access .

class.name: CATCommandHeader
class.abstract: Class to create a command header.

method.name: BecomeAvailable
method.abstract: Makes the command Available.

method.name: BecomeUnavailable
method.abstract: Makes the command Unavailable.

method.name: Clone
method.abstract: Clones the command header.

method.name: GetCurrentArgument
method.abstract: Retrieves the argument of the header.

method.name: GetVisibility
method.abstract: Returns the header visibility in the Tools/Customize command.

method.name: SetVisibility
method.abstract: Sets the header visibility in the Tools/Customize command.

class.name: CATCommandHeaderWithSDO
class.abstract: Base class for command headers to represent objects contained in a CATSDO.

class.name: CATExtIEdit
class.abstract: Adapter for the CATIEdit interface .

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Returns the command to launch to edit the object.

method.name: Deactivate
method.abstract: Deactivation of the feature edition command.

method.name: GetPanelItem
method.abstract: Returns a widget representing the current feature.

method.name: IsActive
method.abstract: Returns an integer value telling whether the command is launched or not.

class.name: CATExtIUIActivate
class.abstract: Adapter class for the CATIUIActivate interface.

method.name: GetDefaultCommand
method.abstract: Returns the name of the default command.

method.name: GetWorkshop
method.abstract: Returns the name of the workshop.

data.name: _DefaultCommandString
data.abstract: The Name of the first command .

class.name: CATExtIWorkbenchTransition
class.abstract: Adapter for the CATIWorkbenchTransition interface.

method.name: DoTransition
method.abstract: Handles or not the transition.

class.name: CATExtInPlaceSite
class.abstract: Adapter for the CATInPlaceSite interface.

method.name: CanInPlaceActivate
method.abstract: Asks the site whether it accepts a subordinates ui-activable object's ui-activation.

method.name: OnInPlaceActivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that ui-activation will begin.

method.name: OnInPlaceDeactivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that ui-activation will end.

method.name: OnUIActivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that the ui-active object's workshop is going to be displayed.

method.name: OnUIDeactivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that the ui-active object's workshop is going to be removed.

constructor.name: CATFrm3DCamera
constructor.abstract: Constructs a 3D camera with default parameters.

method.name: CopyFrom
method.abstract: Makes a 3D camera identical with another one in copying all its parameters.

method.name: GetDirection
method.abstract: Returns the sight direction of a 3D camera.

method.name: GetOrigin
method.abstract: Returns the origin (eye position) of a 3D camera.

method.name: GetTarget
method.abstract: Returns the target point of a 3D camera.

method.name: GetViewAngle
method.abstract: Returns the view angle of a 3D conic camera.

method.name: GetZenith
method.abstract: Returns the up direction of a 3D camera.

method.name: GetZoom
method.abstract: Returns the zoom value of a 3D cylindric camera.

method.name: SetDirection
method.abstract: Changes the sight direction of a 3D camera.

method.name: SetOrigin
method.abstract: Changes the origin of a 3D camera.

method.name: SetTarget
method.abstract: Changes the target point of a 3D camera.

method.name: SetType
method.abstract: Changes the type of a 3D camera.

method.name: SetViewAngle
method.abstract: Changes the view angle of a 3D conic camera.

method.name: SetZenith
method.abstract: Changes the up direction of a 3D camera.

method.name: SetZoom
method.abstract: Changes the zoom value of a 3D cylindric camera.

method.name: CopyFrom
method.abstract: Makes a camera identical with another one in copying all its parameters.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Returns the name of a camera.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of a camera.

method.name: SetName
method.abstract: Changes the name of a camera.

class.name: CATFrmEditor
class.abstract: Base class for a document editor.

method.name: CATDeclareCBEvent
method.abstract: Event sent when the editor is closed.

method.name: CATDeclareCBEvent
method.abstract: Event sent when an ui-activable object is activated.

method.name: CATDeclareCBEvent
method.abstract: Event sent after the ui-activable object has changed.

method.name: GetCSO
method.abstract: Returns the Current Selection of Objects.

method.name: GetCommandSelector
method.abstract: Returns the command selector created by the editor.

method.name: GetCompass
method.abstract: Returns the compass.

method.name: GetCurrentEditor
method.abstract: Returns the current activated editor.

method.name: GetDocument
method.abstract: Returns the document associated to the editor.

method.name: GetFurtiveISO
method.abstract: Returns the Furtive Interactive Set of Objects.

method.name: GetHSO
method.abstract: Returns the Highlighted Set of Objects.

method.name: GetISO
method.abstract: Returns the Interactive Set of Objects.

method.name: GetPSO
method.abstract: Returns the Preselected Set of Objets.

method.name: GetUIActiveObject
method.abstract: Returns the current UI-activated element.

method.name: GetWindowCount
method.abstract: Returns the number of window of the editor.

method.name: SetActivePath
method.abstract: Activates an element of the given path.

method.name: UnsetRepeatedCommand
method.abstract: Unsets the repeated command .

class.name: CATFrmLayout
class.abstract: Class to manage a set of CATFrmWindow.

method.name: GetCurrentLayout
method.abstract: Returns the unique CATFrmLayout created by CATIA session.

method.name: GetCurrentWindow
method.abstract: Returns the current active window.

method.name: GetWindowList
method.abstract: Returns a list of windows.

method.name: SetCurrentWindow
method.abstract: Changes the current active window.

class.name: CATFrmObjectEditor
class.abstract: Class for a document editor.

class.name: CATFrmWindow
class.abstract: Class to provid a working area to visualize application data.

method.name: CATDeclareCBEvent
method.abstract: Event sent when the window is deleted.

method.name: CATDeclareCBEvent
method.abstract: Event sent when the window is activated.

method.name: CATDeclareCBEvent
method.abstract: Event sent when the window is deactivated.

method.name: DeleteWindow
method.abstract: Close the window.

method.name: DuplicateWindow
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new window of the same document.

method.name: GetBaseName
method.abstract: Returns the name of window.

method.name: GetCurrentCamera
method.abstract: Retrieves the current viewpoint of the window.

method.name: GetEditor
method.abstract: Returns the document editor.

method.name: GetViewer
method.abstract: Returns the viewer created in the window.

method.name: GetViewerFrame
method.abstract: Returns the frame in wich the viewer will be attached.

method.name: SetBaseName
method.abstract: Changes the name of window.

method.name: SetCurrentCamera
method.abstract: Changes the viewpoint of the window.

method.name: SetViewer
method.abstract: Changes the current viewer of the window.

class.name: CATISO
class.abstract: Class for visualizing temporary objects in given viewers.

method.name: AddElement
method.abstract: Adds an object to the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: AddViewer
method.abstract: Adds a 2D viewer to the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: AddViewer
method.abstract: Adds a 3D viewer to the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: Empty
method.abstract: Empties the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: GetNextElement
method.abstract: Returns the next object of the the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: InitElementList
method.abstract: Sets the cursor at the begining of the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: IsMember
method.abstract: Checks if an object is in the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: RemoveElement
method.abstract: Removes an object from the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: RemoveViewer
method.abstract: Removes a 2D viewer from the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: RemoveViewer
method.abstract: Removes a 3D viewer from the Interactive Set Of Objects.

method.name: UpdateElement
method.abstract: Modifies a given object hold in the Interactive Set Of Objects.

class.name: CATISOAdd2DViewer
class.abstract: Class representing a notification sent when a 2Dviewer is added into an Interactive Set Of Objects.

data.name: _Viewer
data.abstract: the viewer added in the Interactive Set Of Objects.

class.name: CATISOAdd3DViewer
class.abstract: Class representing a notification sent when a 3Dviewer is added into an Interactive Set Of Objects.

data.name: _Viewer
data.abstract: The viewer added in the Interactive Set Of Objects.

class.name: CATISORemove2DViewer
class.abstract: Class representing a notification sent when a 2Dviewer is removed from an Interactive Set Of Objects.

data.name: _Viewer
data.abstract: the viewer removed from the Interactive Set Of Objects.

class.name: CATISORemove3DViewer
class.abstract: Class representing a notification sent when a 3Dviewer is removed from an Interactive Set Of Objects.

data.name: _Viewer
data.abstract: the viewer removed from the Interactive Set Of Objects.

class.name: CATLISTP(CATBaseUnknown)

class.name: CATStackableCommandSet
class.abstract: Class to store a list of command header instance name.

constructor.name: CATStackableCommandSet
constructor.abstract: Constructs a default list of command header name.

constructor.name: CATStackableCommandSet
constructor.abstract: Constructs a list of command header name from an other one.

method.name: AddCommand
method.abstract: Adds a name to the list.

method.name: AddCommand
method.abstract: Adds a name to the list.

method.name: AddSet
method.abstract: Adds a set of command header name.

method.name: Contains
method.abstract: Checks if a name exists in the list.

method.name: GetSize
method.abstract: Returns the count of name in the list.

method.name: RemoveCommand
method.abstract: Removes a name from the list.

method.name: RemoveCommand
method.abstract: Removes a name from the list.

class.name: CATTaskController
class.abstract: Class to launch an interruptible task.

method.name: Schedule
method.abstract: Launches the task.

class.name: CATWorkbenchTransitionCmd

constructor.name: CATWorkbenchTransitionCmd
constructor.abstract: Constructor with the passed target workbench.

class.name: CATWorkshopConfigurationFactory
class.abstract: Base class to create a workbench factory.

class.name: CATWorkshopFactory
class.abstract: Base class to create a workshop factory.

class.name: CNext
class.abstract: Class to define a new product line.

define.name: AddAccessChild
define.abstract: Declares an access to add in a container.

define.name: AddToolbarView
define.abstract: Adds a toolbar into the workshop or into the workbench.

define.name: CATDeclareConfigurationFactory
define.abstract: Defines the header file of a workbench factory class.

define.name: CATDeclareHeaderResources
define.abstract: Defines a method to get the header's resource file.

define.name: CATDeclareHeaderSpecialResources
define.abstract: Defines a method to get the header's resource file, in a special way.

define.name: CATDeclareWorkshopFactory
define.abstract: Defines the header file of a workshop factory class.

define.name: CATImplementConfigurationFactory
define.abstract: Defines the source file of the workbench factory class.

define.name: CATImplementHeaderResources
define.abstract: Implements the methods to get the header's resource file.

define.name: CATImplementHeaderSpecialResources
define.abstract: Implements the methods to get the header's resource file.

define.name: CATImplementWorkshopFactory
define.abstract: Defines the source file of the workshop factory class.

define.name: MacDeclareDerivedHeader
define.abstract: Declares and defines a header class.

define.name: MacDeclareHeader
define.abstract: Declares and defines a header class.

define.name: NewAccess
define.abstract: Creates an access.

define.name: SAP_INVALID_ARG
define.abstract: Error Message.

define.name: SAP_NO_LICENSE
define.abstract: Error Message.

define.name: SAP_OBJECT_IN_USE
define.abstract: Error Message.

define.name: SAP_REFUSED_BY_SITE
define.abstract: Error Message.

define.name: SetAccessAnchorName
define.abstract: Anchors an access before a given access.

define.name: SetAccessChild
define.abstract: Declares the first access of a container.

define.name: SetAccessCommand
define.abstract: Attaches a command header to a starter.

define.name: SetAccessNext
define.abstract: Chains an access to a previous one in a container.

define.name: SetAddinMenu
define.abstract: Merges the addin's menubar with the workbench's menubar.

define.name: SetWorkbenchMenu
define.abstract: Merges the workbench's menubar with the workshop's menubar.

define.name: SetWorkbenchToolbarStyle
define.abstract: Sets the toolbar style for the workbench.

define.name: SetWorkbenchToolbarsExclusive
define.abstract: Sets the toolbars exclusive for the workbench.

define.name: SetWorkshopMenu
define.abstract: Merges the workshop's menubar with the default menubar.

function.name: CATAfrEmptyUndoRedoStacks
function.abstract: Flushes the Undo and Redo stacks.

function.abstract: Gets a pointer to a command header.

function.name: CATAfrGetWorkbenchIdentifierFromNLSName

function.name: CATAfrIsUndoRedoLocked
function.abstract: Checks whether the Undo/Redo mechanism is freezed.

function.name: CATAfrNewTransaction
function.abstract:
Creates a new transaction
Role: This method creates a new transaction in the UI Undo/Redo mechanism.

function.abstract: Starts the command associated with a command header.

class.name: CATIAfrActivateWorkbench
class.abstract: Interface to choose the initial workbench when UI activating an object.

method.name: GetPaletteOptions

method.name: GetPaletteStateOptions
method.abstract: Gets the options to display when changing the command current state.

class.name: CATIAfrCommandHeaderRep
class.abstract: Interface to customize the representations of a command header.

method.name: CreateCtxMenuRep
method.abstract: Creates a representation to be displayed in a contextual menu.

method.abstract: Creates a representation to be displayed in the menu bar.

method.name: CreateToolbarRep
method.abstract: Creates a representation to be displayed in a toolbar.

class.name: CATIAfrDialog
class.abstract: Class to derive to provide an interface to visualize object in a toolbar.

class.name: CATIAfrDialogForAgent
class.abstract: Interface to visualize a dialog agent in a toolbar.

class.name: CATIAfrGeneralWksAddin
class.abstract: Interface to implement to create an addin on the general workshop.

class.name: CATIAfrPaletteOptions

method.name: GetPaletteOptions

method.abstract: Method to call when ui-activating.

method.name: UIDeactivation
method.abstract: Method to call when ui-deactivating.

class.name: CATICSOFilter

method.name: AvailableElements
method.abstract: Query for available objects from CSO.

method.name: CommandIsAvailable
method.abstract: Query for command availability.

class.name: CATICamera
class.abstract: interface to make viewpoint persistent.

method.name: CopyFrom
method.abstract: Makes a camera identical with another one in copying all its parameters.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the camera.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of the camera.

method.name: SetName

class.name: CATIContextualSubMenu
class.abstract: Interface to add menu item in the contextual menu.

method.name: GetContextualSubMenu
method.abstract: Returns the sub menu access.

class.name: CATIDocumentEdit
class.abstract: Interface to enable the correct behaviour of a document in the MDI (Multiple Document Interface) CATIA application.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Unused method.

method.name: CreateDefaultWindow
method.abstract: Creates a window to display a document.

method.name: Deactivate
method.abstract: Unused method.

method.name: GetActiveObject
method.abstract: Returns a path to the first object to ui-activate.

method.name: MemoryDraw
method.abstract: Returns a picture containing a snapshot of the document in OLE context.

class.name: CATIEdit
class.abstract: Interface implemented by CATIA objects to react to double clicking.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Returns the command to launch to edit the object.

method.name: GetPanelItem
method.abstract: Returns a <tt>CATDlgFrame</tt> widget representing the current feature.

class.name: CATIProgressTask
class.abstract: Interface describing an interruptible task.

method.name: GetCatalogName
method.abstract: Returns the NLS filename.

method.name: GetIcon
method.abstract: Returns the icon name.

method.name: PerformTask
method.abstract: Executes the task.

class.name: CATIProgressTaskUI
class.abstract: Interface to customize user interface for an interruptible task.

method.name: Flush
method.abstract: Commits the UI's modifications.

method.name: GetAutoFlush
method.abstract: Gets the auto flush state.

method.name: Interruptible
method.abstract: Sets the interruptible state of the progress bar.

method.name: IsInterrupted
method.abstract: Tells whether a task interruption is requested.

method.name: SetAutoFlush
method.abstract: Indicates to the user interface to manage automatically the flush.

method.name: SetComment
method.abstract: Sets a runtime comment.

method.name: SetObject
method.abstract: Sets a runtime object name concerned by the task.

method.name: SetProgress
method.abstract: Sets the current progress indicator's value.

method.name: SetRange
method.abstract: Sets minimal and maximal range of the progress bar.

class.name: CATIReframeCamera
class.abstract: Interface to make camera reframed automatically.

method.name: GetReframe
method.abstract: Returns the automatic reframe ability status.

method.name: SetReframe
method.abstract: Sets or unsets the automatic reframe ability.

class.name: CATIRepeatableCommand
class.abstract: Interface to override the default behavior for command repeating.

method.name: RepeatCommand
method.abstract: Overrides the default behavior for command repeating.

class.name: CATIUIActivate
class.abstract: Interface that enables the activation of a workshop when double- clicking an object.

method.name: GetDefaultCommand
method.abstract: Returns the name of the default command to start for this ui-activable object.

method.name: GetDocument
method.abstract: Returns the document instance containing this ui-activable object.

method.name: GetWorkshop
method.abstract: Returns the name of the workshop associated with this ui-activable object.

class.name: CATIWorkbench
class.abstract: Interface to derive to create a workbench.

method.name: CreateCommands
method.abstract: Instantiates the command headers.

method.name: CreateWorkbench
method.abstract: Creates the workbench accesses.

method.name: GetAddinInterface
method.abstract: Returns the name of the interface exposed by the workbench to create add-ins.

method.name: GetCustomInterfaces
method.abstract: Replaces specific interfaces by customized interfaces.

class.name: CATIWorkbenchAddin
class.abstract: Interface to derive to create an addin.

method.name: CreateCommands
method.abstract: Instantiates the command headers.

method.name: CreateToolbars
method.abstract: Creates toolbars containers.

class.name: CATIWorkbenchInitialization
class.abstract: Interface to do some initializations before starting a workbench.

method.name: Dispose
method.abstract: Method called when the workbench is exited.

method.name: Init
method.abstract: Method called when the workbench becomes the current one.

class.name: CATIWorkbenchTransition
class.abstract: Interface to create transition between workbenches.

method.name: DoTransition
method.abstract: Handles or not the transition if possible.

class.name: CATIWorkshop
class.abstract: Interface to create a workshop.

method.name: CreateCommands
method.abstract: Instantiates the command headers.

method.name: CreateWorkshop
method.abstract: Creates the workshop accesses.

method.name: GetAddinInterface
method.abstract: Returns the name of the interface exposed by the workshop to create add-ins.

method.name: GetWorkbenchInterface
method.abstract: Returns the name of the interface exposed by the workshop to create workbenches.

class.name: CATInPlaceSite
class.abstract: Interface to allow ui-activation of embedded objects implementing the CATIUIActivate interface.

method.name: CanInPlaceActivate
method.abstract: Asks the site whether it accepts a subordinates ui-activable object's ui-activation.

method.name: OnInPlaceActivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that ui-activation will begin.

method.name: OnInPlaceDeactivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that ui-activation will end.

method.name: OnUIActivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that the ui-active object's workshop is going to be displayed.

method.name: OnUIDeactivate
method.abstract: Notifies the site that the ui-active object's workshop is going to be removed.
